Package com.deco2800.game.services

Class MusicService

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.services.MusicService
public class MusicService
extends java.lang.Object
Service for playing and controlling the play of game music, this is different to a loadAsset() function as it doesn't control the loading of the assets, however it controls the playing and where the music plays.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    MusicService​(java.lang.String musicLocation)
    Initial constructor class of the music service

  • Method Details

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()
      Stop this music.

    • isMusicPlaying

      public boolean isMusicPlaying()
      Checks whether this music is playing.
      Returns:
      boolean: true - if the music is playing, false - if the music is not playing

    • getTime

      public float getTime()
      Get the playback position of this music in seconds.
      Returns:
      the playback position.

    • playSong

      public void playSong​(boolean loop, float vol)
      Play this music with the given volume and loop value. If loop is true, the music is played in the loop. Required: an integer between 0 and 1
